attributes.action: That Freemasons should no longer be a secret society - esotoric.
attributes.additional_details: I propose a law for Freemasons not to be banned from holding positions as this is not democratic, but for them to no longer be a secret society. No longer a society with secrets -esoteric- only inteligable to the initiated.  If they become open and have nothing to hide in an illegal way, it would be a more progresive 21st Century understanding.  They should have to declare themselves in any public position, Government, Army, Navy, Airforce, Religion, Judges, Royal Family, Police, business, Fire Brigade, NHS, & Ambasadors from other countries.
